content: Use the search LDAP filter to select the users who must be imported.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a tooltip explaining the purpose of an LDAP user filter field in a connection settings page. The tooltip appears when hovering over the label and provides context for users unfamiliar with LDAP filters.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'İdxal' is spelled incorrectly. It should be 'İdxal et'.
The sentence structure could be improved for better flow. A more natural phrasing would place the action before the object.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP axtarış filtrindən istifadə edərək idxal edilməli olan istifadəçiləri seçin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '検索LDAPフィルタを使用して、インポートするユーザーを選択してください' is a literal translation but could be improved for naturalness in Japanese.  'インポートする' (import suru) is grammatically correct, but '取り込む' (torikomu) or '取り上げる' (toriau) would be more common when referring to importing data/users in a technical context.  '選択してください' is also slightly formal and can be softened.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 検索LDAPフィルタを使用して、取り込むユーザーを選択してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of katakana (LDAP) is consistent with common practice in Japanese technical documentation but could be further considered if the target audience has varying levels of English familiarity. A more thorough explanation (e.g., adding 'エル・ディー・エイピー' in hiragana next to the katakana) might be better for broader accessibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 検索LDAP (エル・ディー・エイピー) フィルタを使用して、取り込むユーザーを選択してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "가져오기 해야 하는 사용자를 선택하세요" is awkward and not a natural way to express the intended meaning. It literally translates to 'select the users that must be imported.' A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 검색 LDAP 필터를 사용하여 가져올 사용자를 선택하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the phrase '가져오기 해야 하는' sounds unnecessarily formal and complex. A simpler construction would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 검색 LDAP 필터를 사용하여 가져올 사용자를 선택하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂຕົວກວດກາ LDAP' is a literal translation of 'LDAP filter' that might not be easily understood by Lao speakers. 'ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂຕົວກວດກາ' means 'filter editor', which isn't the core meaning. The word 'ຕົວກວດກາ' (filter) is redundant and adds unnecessary complexity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ນໍາໃຊ້ຕົວປ່ຽນແກ້ໄຂ LDAP ເພື່ອເລືອກເອົາຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຈະນໍາເຂົ້າມາ។ (Use the LDAP filter to select the users who must be imported.) - Simplifying the term 'LDAP filter' will improve clarity. A more culturally appropriate translation might use a simpler term for 'filter' that is commonly used in the context of user selection, if available. Alternatively, a more explanatory phrase could be used instead of a direct translation, such as 'ໃຊ້ຄໍາແນະນໍາໃນການຄົ້ນຫາ LDAP ເພື່ອເລືອກຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ຕ້ອງການນໍາເຂົ້າມາ' (Use the LDAP search guide to select the users who must be imported).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation starts with a capitalized word 'Gebruik'. In UI elements, tooltips often benefit from starting with a lowercase letter for better readability.
The Romanian translation 'Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta utilizatorii pentru importul' is grammatically awkward. 'pentru importul' should be 'pentru import'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Folosiți filtru de căutare LDAP pentru a selecta utilizatorii pentru import.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රාණයනය සඳහා ආනයනය කළ යුතු පරිශීලකයින් තෝරා ගැනීමට සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න.' is not the most accurate or natural rendering of 'Use the search LDAP filter to select the users who must be imported.' 'ප්‍රාණයනය' (pranayanaya) which translates to 'animation' is used incorrectly. A more suitable translation for 'imported' in this context might be 'රැගෙන ඒමට' (ragenema eema).  The phrasing is also a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රධාන පරිශීලකයින් රැගෙන ඒමට අවශ්‍ය පරිශීලකයන් තෝරා ගැනීමට සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While understandable, it could be improved for better flow in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රධාන පරිශීලකයින් රැගෙන ඒමට අවශ්‍ය පරිශීලකයන් තෝරා ගැනීමට සෙවුම් LDAP පෙරකය භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ki jih je potrebno uvoziti" is a bit verbose and formal. A more natural and concise translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Uporabi iskalni filter LDAP, da izbereš uporabnike za uvoz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Користите LDAP филтер за претрагу да бисте изабрали кориснике који морају бити увезени.' is a bit verbose and not the most natural way to express the meaning.  'Претрагу' (search) is redundant.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Користите LDAP филтер да бисте изабрали кориснике који морају бити увезени.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Koristite LDAP filter za pretragu da biste izabrali korisnike koji moraju biti uvezeni' is a bit literal and could be improved for natural flow. 'Za pretragu' (for searching) is redundant as 'LDAP filter' inherently implies searching.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koristite LDAP filter za odabir korisnika koji će biti uvezeni.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Sử dụng bộ lọc tìm kiếm LDAP để chọn người dùng phải được nhập" is not the most natural or precise translation. "phải được nhập" implies a requirement or obligation, which isn't necessarily present in the English context. A more accurate rendering would reflect selection rather than mandatory import.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sử dụng bộ lọc LDAP để chọn người dùng sẽ được nhập.
